title: Maryland Partners With State Universities To Increase Screening Of COVID-19 Variants
description: By increasing its screening of COVID-19 variants, Maryland officials say they will get a better sense of how widespread they are.
cleaned_text: This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible.
